titles.title: He's A Wonderful Saviour To Me

authors.author: Blanche Kerr Brock Virgil P. Brock

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For He's a
wonderful Savior to me,
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I was lost in sin,
but Jesus took me in.
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I was lost in sin,
but Jesus rescued me.
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I was bound by fear,
but Jesus set me free.
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He's a friend so true,
so patient and so kind.
He's wonderful
Savior to me,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Ev'rything I need
in Him I always find.
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He is always near,
to comfort and to cheer.
He's a wonderful
Savior to me,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
He forgives my sin,
He dries my ev'ry tear,
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Dearer grows the love
of Jesus day by day,
He's a wonderful
Savior to me,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Sweeter is His grace,
while pressing on my way.
He's a wonderful
Savior to me.
